title: Jim Corridore Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Jim Corridore? Check out all of Jim Corridore's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogJim Corridore Senior Analyst Jim Corridore Jim creates actionable insights in the travel, auto, consumer electronics, health/fitness and CPG/retail sectors. Prior to joining Similarweb, Jim was a 30-year Wall Street professional, who covered the industrials, transportation, technology and specialty retail spaces throughout his career, among others. From 2020-September 2021, Jim served as an industry analyst and senior content moderator at Guidepoint, an expert network company. He created events of interest to Wall Street and interviewed subject matter experts including former CEOs, CFOs and other executives and industry experts. He also previously held the position of Director of Industrials Research at S&P Global. Mr. Corridore joined CFRA in 2016 and S&P Global in 1988. He is a seven-time winner of the Wall Street Journal’s “Best on the Street” poll and has won several other awards for his stock-picking acumen. Mr. Corridore is a graduate of the State University of New York at Albany.
